name: Nick Staroba
title: Frontend Developer
introductionParagraphs: I am a frontend developer creating user-centric single page applications and utilizing experience with interaction design, visual design, usability guidelines, accessibility, and code standards to contribute to any part of the development process.
Core Technologies: CSS, Git, HTML, JavaScript (ES6, ECMAScript), Jest, MUI, NPM, React, React Testing Library, Redux, SASS, Storybook, Styled Components,TypeScript, webpack.

Additional: Azure DevOps, Agile, Artifactory, Atlassian (Bitbucket, Jira), Code Review, Component Libraries, Design Systems, Documentation, Github (Github Actions), Gulp, Lerna, Linting, Mentoring, Responsive, Rollup, Server Side Rendering (SSR), Tooling, Unit Testing, User Experience (UX).

projects.name: Enterprise Frontend Applications, Consumer User Interfaces
projects.body: This application manages inventory, ordering, and other operational functions like managing users and manufacturing assets. Transitioned the current application from Create React App to a Vite configuration with robust linting and Storybook. Currently implementing a new website with Next.js and MUI that enables customers to order directly.
projects.technologies: Technologies: Azure DevOps, CSS, ESLint, JavaScript, Next.js, MUI, React, React Bootstrap, SASS, Storybook, TypeScript, Vite.

projects.name: UnitedHealthcare Mobile Application
projects.body: This application allows healthcare consumers to access their insurance cards, review and manage prescriptions, and view information on related spending. Aided in the redesign and conversion of a React Native application from flow to TypeScript. Reimplemented artifact publishing during the transition of infrastructure from Rally Health to Optum. Implemented critical features like ID cards, vaccine cards, and UI for claims and benefits.
projects.technologies: Technologies: Agile, Artifactory, Component Library, Github, JavaScript, Jest, React Native, React Testing Library, Redux, Styled Components, TypeScript, Unit Testing.

projects.name: Enterprise Frontend Applications, Consumer User Interfaces
projects.body: Participated in frontend development in a range of domains, projects, and technologies while contracting independently for over two years. Key accomplishments included implementing the technologies and processes for building shared assets like component libraries and tooling configurations. Assets like these facilitated consistent user interfaces as well as consistent code across repositories.
projects.technologies: Technologies: Shared Component Library, CSS, Design System, ESLint, Github, Github Actions, Gulp, HTML, JavaScript, Jest, JSS, Lerna, lint-staged, React, React Testing Library, Redux, Rollup, SASS, SASS Modules, Storybook, Stylelint, TypeScript, webpack.

projects.name: Enterprise Engineering Platform
projects.body: This platform aims to deliver fleet management, analytics, and telematics in real-time to connected vehicles. The frontend uses React and higher-order components to manage a set of complex data-grid views and user interactions. These interactions were implemented in coordination with the UX designer to ensure final implementations were accepted.
projects.technologies: Technologies: ag-Grid, BEM, Blueprint, CSS, Enzyme, Jest, JSDoc, Lodash, Moment.js, React, React Router, REST, SASS, Storybook, TypeScript, webpack.

projects.name: Internal Systems, External Properties, Promotion and Marketing
projects.body: Designed and developed internal web applications to manage the various aspects of promotion and marketing and other vital company activities. An internal analytics application, one example system, reduced the workload of a single activity by 75% while also replacing an obsolete desktop-only system. Public-facing work included designing and implementing a dynamic, content-driven, website using a common CMS and custom plugins that pull data from separate internal databases to show job postings and candidate listings on the website.
projects.technologies: Technologies: BEM, Bootstrap, CSS, D3.js, Docker, Grunt, HTML, HTML Email, JavaScript, SASS.

degrees.title: AAS in Web Design and Development
